RoomDescription.Name: Viceroy Deluxe Double
RoomDescription.Text: Rich exotic woods, sumptuous leather and mixed-metal accents create a warm atmosphere and tailored elegance in the Viceroy Double rooms, set overlooking the urban views of 57th Street. The Viceroy Double rooms feature two double beds, a sleek working desk, classic light fixtures and a tiled bathroom with walk-in shower and full-sized Neil George spa products. Amenities include custom-designed Sferra linens, a high-definition flat-screen Samsung Smart TV, Beats by Dr. Dre™ Beatbox Portable™ Sound System, and complimentary wired and wireless high-speed Internet availability.

RoomDescription.Name: Viceroy Junior Suite
RoomDescription.Text: With a City view overlooking 57th Street the open plan Junior Suite offers a central seating area to afford you extra space. As well as our Brilliantly comfy King sized bed the room features a pull out queen sized sofa making it a perfect choice for families. Located on the lower floors of the hotel the floor to ceiling picture windows of the room are reminiscent of Manhattan’s quintessential downtown lofts and give an abundance of natural light. This room type offers interconnecting options with a Viceroy Double Room. The living area includes such amenities as an Illy espresso machine, high-definition flat-screen Samsung Smart TVs, and complimentary wired and wireless high-speed Internet availability.

RoomDescription.Name: Viceroy Deluxe
RoomDescription.Text: Rich exotic woods, sumptuous leather and mixed-metal accents create a warm atmosphere and tailored elegance in the Viceroy Deluxe rooms, set overlooking the urban views of 57th Street. The Viceroy Deluxe rooms feature a king-sized bed, sleek working desk, classic light fixtures and a tiled bathroom with walk-in shower and full-sized Neil George spa products. Amenities include custom-designed Sferra linens, a high-definition flat-screen Samsung Smart TV, Beats by Dr. Dre™ Beatbox Portable™ Sound System, and complimentary wired and wireless high-speed Internet availability.

RoomDescription.Name: Viceroy Superior
RoomDescription.Text: The Viceroy Superior rooms feature a king-sized bed with an interior courtyard view, sleek working desk, classic light fixtures and a tiled bathroom with walk-in shower and full-sized Neil George spa products. Amenities include custom-designed Sferra linens, a high-definition flat-screen Samsung Smart TV, Beats by Dr. Dre™ Beatbox Portable™ Sound System, and complimentary wired and wireless high-speed Internet availability.

RoomDescription.Name: Viceroy Park View
RoomDescription.Text: Viceroy Park View rooms offers guests a spectacular view over Central Park, one of New York’s most iconic attractions and Manhattan’s largest green area. The Park View rooms also feature a king-sized bed, sleek working desk, classic light fixtures and a tiled bathroom with walk-in shower and full-sized Neil George spa products. Amenities include custom-designed Sferra linens, a high-definition flat-screen Samsung Smart TV, Beats by Dr. Dre™ Beatbox Portable™ Sound System, and complimentary wired and wireless high-speed Internet availability.

RoomDescription.Name: Viceroy Suite 57
RoomDescription.Text: Encompassing the entire north side of the 28th floor, the 57th Street Suite not only offers breathtaking views over Central Park and Manhattan’s dramatic skyline, it also provides the most spacious accommodations at Viceroy New York. Designed in exotic woods, supple leather and a mix of metal accents for the utmost in refined elegance, the well-appointed 57th Street Suite provides a generous seating area with sofa and coffee table, Illy espresso machine, classic original light fixtures and two bedrooms, each with a king-sized bed and Sferra linens. The living area includes such amenities as high-definition flat-screen Samsung SmartTVs, and complimentary wired and wireless high-speed Internet availability.. The spacious tiled bathroom features a walk-in shower, and enclosed water closet and full-sized Neil George spa products. Bookings for Suite 57 are nonrefundable. All nights will be charged at time of booking and reservations may not be cancelled or modified.

RoomDescription.Name: Viceroy Park View Suite
RoomDescription.Text: Enjoy unparalleled views of New York’s Central Park from the Viceroy Park Suite, as well as expansive, refined accommodations. Tailored in exotic woods, supple leather and a mix of metal accents, the Viceroy Park Suite provides a generous seating area with sofa and coffee table, Illy espresso machine, classic original light fixtures and a king-sized bed. The living area includes such amenities as high-definition flat-screen Samsung SmartTVs, and complimentary wired and wireless high-speed Internet availability. The spacious tiled bathroom features a walk-in shower, and enclosed water closet and full-sized Neil George spa products.

GuaranteeDescription.Text: Reservations must be guaranteed for late arrival with valid credit card

PenaltyDescription.Text: You may cancel your reservation without penalty until noon local hotel time, 1 days prior to arrival (24-hours).

RatePlanDescription.Name: Suiteness Suite Celebration
RatePlanDescription.Text: Suiteness Suite CelebrationDiscover the perks of an upgrade. Treat yourself to our spacious Junior or Park Suites and save up to 30% on your stay. Rate is per room/per night, based on single or double occupancy, exclusive of taxes, gratuities, fees and other charges; rate does not apply to groups; cannot be combined with any other offer. Offer is subject to availability.

RoomDescription.Name: i Deluxe One Bedroom Suite
RoomDescription.Text: The 530-square-foot Deluxe One Bedroom Suite is The Roxy Hotel’s most spacious guest room with separate living and sleeping areas, 9-foot ceilings and oversized windows. The bedroom is fitted with a sputnik light fixture Deluxe Tivoli clock radio and the hardwood floored living area has a TEAC turntable with curated vinyl, a Marshall bluetooth speaker,and a built-in slab wood desk. The Deluxe One Bedroom Suite also has a Nespresso Espresso Machine and a wet bar that offers cocktail ingredients curated by NYC’s The Liquor Cabinet.

RoomDescription.Name: d Deluxe Double
RoomDescription.Text: The 280-square-foot double double guest room sleeps four guests comfortably in two double beds. Oversized windows and 9-foot ceilings give these rooms extra height and lots of natural light.

RoomDescription.Name: h One Bedroom Suite
RoomDescription.Text: The 440-square-foot One Bedroom Suite has a separate living area with hardwood floors, 9-foot ceilings and oversized windows. The suites come with TEAC turntables, a Marshall bluetooth speaker and custom curated vinyl, plus Deluxe Tivoli Clock Radio. Rooms feature a Nespresso Espresso Machine. With custom sleeper sofas, the One Bedroom Suites can sleep up to four guests.

BasicPropertyInfo.HotelName: The Roxy Hotel (formerly Tribeca Grand Hotel)

RoomDescription.Name: Towers Executive Suite King
RoomDescription.Text: Occupying the hotel's upper floors, these newly renovated Towers Executive Suites measure 655 square feet and 61 square meters featuring custom furnishings, touch screen technology and exceptional skyline views. All Towers accommodations offer complimentary internet access, a dedicated concierge, private reception area, express elevators and butler service.

RoomDescription.Name: Deluxe Corner One Bedroom Suite King
RoomDescription.Text: Enjoy views of St. Patrick’s Cathedral in our Deluxe Corner Suites, featuring an oversized living room with large dining table for eight, wet bar, and full marble bathroom. The spacious bedroom features one king bed with luxurious linens, large work desk, walk-in closet and marble bathroom.

RoomDescription.Name: Towers One Bedroom Suite King
RoomDescription.Text: Towers One Bedroom Suites are perched on the top 14 floors and accessible by private high-speed elevators. The bedroom contains a king bed, work area, and a luxury marble bathroom with a deep soaking tub and separate glass shower. All Towers accommodations also include Maitre d Etage butler service, private reception area and dedicated concierge.

RoomDescription.Name: Towers Corner Suite King
RoomDescription.Text: No detail was overlooked in the design of these spacious and exceptional Towers Corner Suites. Offering expansive city views and a distinctly residential feel these accommodations provide a spacious floor plan for living and entertaining, with an energy that can only belong to New York.

RoomDescription.Name: Apartment Suite King
RoomDescription.Text:
• Bed Type: One King Bed
  • Room includes:
    • Panoramic East and West city views
    • Separate living area with sectional sofa
    • Soaking tub and separate glass enclosed rain shower
    • Access to Stylist Collection offering travel-centric must haves selected by stylist including designers Trina Turk, Kara Ross, Paul Smith, Ernest Alexander and more
    • High floor
    • Complimentary WiFi
    • Residentially styled
    • The Pantry
    • 42 inch plasma TV
    • Triple Filtered Water
    • Reclaimed wood floors
    • Oversized windows
    • Sony Multifunction iPod Station
    • Art by local artists
    • Nightly turndown with Kee's Chocolate
    • 100% Turkish Cotton towels
    • Custom robes and slippers
    • Intelligent Nutrients bath amenities
    • Smoke Free Environment

RoomDescription.Name: Apartment Suite King - Accessible
RoomDescription.Text: Our 1 bedroom accessible apartment suite is designed in true upscale residential style featuring a palette of warm tones. The contemporary layout and custom designed furniture include a King Bed dressed in natural linens, private work/dining niche, 42 inch flat screen televisions and reclaimed wood floors. Oversized windows provide an abundance of natural light and a great city view in a panoramic setting. Standard James amenities include: nightly turndown service, custom robes and slippers, complimentary wi-fi, cocktail and snack bar, custom comfortable beds, Sony multifunction iPod stations, and 100% Turkish cotton towels. Accessible features include lowered door viewer and latches and lowered shelving. Bathrooms are equipped with roll-in showers and grab bars.

Description.Text: Credit Card Guaranteed

RoomDescription.Name: King Deluxe
RoomDescription.Text: Our King Deluxe rooms measure 350 square feet and features a king bed with custom-made 400 thread count SFERRA linens. The newly renovated rooms feature floor to ceiling windows with views of the historic TriBeCa neighborhood, along with full marble bathroom features a 14 square foot floor-to-ceiling frosted glass shower with bathroom amenities by D.S. & Durga. All accommodations include complimentary high-speed wireless internet, & turndown service with a complimentary bottle of water.

RoomDescription.Name: King Suite
RoomDescription.Text: Our King Suites measure 550 square feet with interior views for a more private experience. The newly renovated suite features a king bed with custom-made 400 thread count SFERRA linens. This suite includes a separate alcove lounge area which features a sofa with a twin sized pull out bed. The full marble bathroom offers a glass rain shower and separate deep soaking tub, along with bathroom amenities by D.S. & Durga. All of the rooms include complimentary high-speed wireless internet & turndown service with a complimentary bottle of water.

RoomDescription.Name: Penthouse
RoomDescription.Text: Designed and renovated by Gachot Studios in 2015, our Penthouse Suite measures 1200 square feet along with a spacious 800 square foot terrace highlighting views of Tribeca. The Penthouse Suite offers a spacious master bedroom with a king bed with custom-made 400 thread count SFERRA linens. The expansive living area with luxe lounge furniture includes a dining area with a large dining room table, with seating for ten guests. This suite also features one and a half bathrooms with amenities by D.S. & Durga, with the master marble bathroom offering a deluxe spa shower and separate oversized bathtub. This suite is inclusive of complimentary minibar items, hotel laundry & dry cleaning services up to four pieces of clothing per day, high-speed wireless internet, & turndown service. This suite is also inclusive of a complimentary transfer to and from any airport, train and port in the New York area.

RoomDescription.Name: Smyth Suite
RoomDescription.Text: Designed and renovated by Gachot Studios in 2015, our Smyth Suite measures at 1000 square feet & offers views of Tribeca, Freedom Tower and the Empire State Building. The Smyth Suite offers a master bedroom with a king bed with custom-made 400 thread count SFERRA linens. The master marble bathroom offers a deluxe spa shower with amenities by D.S. & Durga. The loft like living area with luxe lounge furniture also features a dining area with seating for eight guests. A private 300 square foot balcony with dining table lounge area are ideal for entertaining. The suite also features a half bathroom with amenities by D.S. & Durga. This suite is inclusive of high-speed wireless internet & turndown service.

RoomDescription.Name: Thompson Suite
RoomDescription.Text: Designed and renovated by Gachot Studios in 2015, our Thompson Suites measure 900 square feet and offer spectacular views of Tribeca with its floor to ceiling windows. This suite features a master bedroom with a king bed with custom-made 400 thread count SFERRA linens. The suite also features a separate living area with luxe lounge furniture and a dining area with a large dining table with seating for six, an ideal setting to entertain in. The suite also features one and a half bathrooms with bathroom amenities by D.S. & Durga, with the master marble bathroom offering a deluxe spa shower. This suite is inclusive of complimentary high-speed wireless internet & turndown service with a complimentary bottle of water.

RoomDescription.Name: King Suite
RoomDescription.Text: This 650 square foot suite features one king bed with glass corner balconies and a separate lounge area with a sectional sofa. All rooms are on one of our higher floors, offering exceptional views. The suite has custom-made 400 thread count SFERRA linens, floor to ceiling windows, an illuminated light box headboard by Lee Friedlander and sleek black mirrored walls. Bathroom features froasted glass and slate rain shower and deep soaking tub as well as an oversized terrycloth robe by SFERRA and amenities by REN. Technology features include an LCD flat-screen TV,iPod dock, and an mini-bar stocked with Dean & Deluca snacks. Highspeed wireless and broadband available

RoomDescription.Name: King Suite Terrace
RoomDescription.Text: A full 1 bedroom suite, our King Suite with Terrace features sweeping views of downtown from a sleek terrace. The king sized bed is made up with custom made 400 thread count SFERRA linens and are decorated in rich customized fabrics , illuminated light-box headboards are by world renowned Artist Lee Friedlander. The separate lounge area features a stylish sectional sofa, floor –to-ceiling windows and sleek black mirrored walls. The expansive terrace also features an outdoor dining set for 4 along with 2 inviting chaise lounges. Entertainment options include LCD Flat Screen TV, premium cable and in-room movie library, I-POD docking station/alarm clock, WI-FI and broadband internet access. Our mini-bar offers Dean & Deluca snacks.Each bathroom features: oversized terry robes by Sferra, bathroom amenities by REN, bathroom fixtures by Waterworks and a stunning modern slate shower or bathtub with luxurious rain shower head and peek-a-boo frosted glass.

RoomDescription.Name: Penthouse
RoomDescription.Text: Our Penthouse is located on the top floor of the hotel, offering spectacular views of Manhattan and surrounding areas. A two bedroom suite, our Penthouse features sweeping views of downtown from a sleek terrace. The king sized bed is made up with custom made 400 thread count SFERRA linens and are decorated in rich customized fabrics , illuminated lightbox headboards are by world renowned Artist Lee Friedlander. The bathroom features oversized terry robes by SFERRA, bathroom amenities by REN, bathroom fixtures by Waterworks and a stunning modern slate shower or bathtub with luxurious rain shower head and peek-a-boo frosted glass. Entertainment options include LCD Flat Screen TV, premium cable and in-room movie library, I-POD docking station/alarm clock, WI-FI and broadband internet access. Our mini-bar offers Dean & Deluca snacks. Complimentary WI-FI and broadband internet access are offered. Mini-bar offers Dean & Deluca snacks

RoomDescription.Name: Sixty Suite
RoomDescription.Text: Our Sixty Suite is located on the top floor of the hotel, offering spectacular views of Manhattan and surrounding areas.A full 1 bedroom suite, our Sixty Suite features sweeping views of downtown from a sleek terrace. The king sized bed is made up with custom made 400 thread count SFERRA linens and are decorated in rich customized fabrics , illuminated lightbox headboards are by world renowned Artist Lee Friedlander. The bathroom features oversized terry robes by SFERRA, bathroom amenities by REN, bathroom fixtures by Waterworks and a stunning modern slate shower or bathtub with luxurious rain shower head and peek-a-boo frosted glass.Entertainment options include LCD Flat Screen TV, premium cable and in-room movie library, I-POD docking station/alarm clock, WI-FI and broadband internet access. Our mini-bar offers Dean & Deluca snacks.Complimentary WI-FI and broadband internet access are offered. Mini-bar offers Dean & Deluca snacks

BasicPropertyInfo.HotelName: Hotel 50 Bowery NYC, a Joie de Vivre Hotel

RoomDescription.Name: Deluxe King
RoomDescription.Text: This newly renovated 300 Sq Ft room features a King Bed with custom made 400 thread count SFERRA linens and custom designed leather headboards by JIM WALROD. The luxurious full bathrooms feature marble floors, a state-of-the-art rain shower, oversized Frette terrycloth robes, and curated bathroom amenities by D.S. & Durga. The room also features a 55 inch Flat Screen High Definition LCD TV, music docking station / alarm clock, and a mini bar stocked with locally curated gourmet snacks. Complimentary high-speed internet for up to two devices.

RoomDescription.Name: King Suite
RoomDescription.Text: This newly renovated 560 square foot Suite features a King bed with custom made 400 count SFERRA linens, a custom leather headboard by Jim Walrod, and solid wood floors throughout. The separate lounge area includes a large desk and leather furniture with artwork by Slim Aarons. The luxurious bathroom features dual sinks and marble floors with oversized terrycloth robes by Frette and specially curated bathroom amenities by D.S.& DURGA. The room also features two 55 inch LCD flat screen TV, iPod dock, and mini bar stocked with locally curated gourmet snacks. We offer complimentary coffee in this room. We offer complimentary high-speed internet for up to two devices

RoomDescription.Name: Penthouse
RoomDescription.Text: This newly renovated 850 square foot Suite features a master bedroom with optional connecting room, an open dining and lounge area with wet bar for entertaining. The King bed with custom made 400 count SFERRA linens also features a custom leather headboard by Jim Walrod. The suite comes with one and a half bathrooms with marble floors, oversized terrycloth robes by Frette and specially curated bathroom amenities by D.S.& DURGA. The room also features two 55 inch LCD flat screen TV, iPod dock, and mini bar stocked with locally curated gourmet snacks. We offer complimentary Nespresso for this suite. We offer complimentary high-speed internet for up to two devices

RoomDescription.Name: Thompson Suite
RoomDescription.Text: This newly renovated 825 square foot Suite features a King bed with custom made 400 thread count SFERRA linens, a custom headboard by Jim Walrod, and 12 foot ceilings with antique brass chandelier. The separate luxurious lounge area includes a large dark leather sofa, "bergere" chairs, and bar stools. This Suite features one and a half bathrooms with marble floors, oversized terrycloth robes by Frette and specially curated bathroom amenities by D.S.& DURGA. The room also features two 55 inch LCD flat screen TV, iPod dock, and mini bar stocked with locally curated gourmet snacks. We offer complimentary coffee in this room. We offer complimentary high-speed internet for up to two devices

RoomDescription.Name: One Bedroom Suite
RoomDescription.Text: Spacious and sophisticated One Bedroom suites, starting at 716 square feet, are furnished in a contemporary, yet comfortable style. Spacious living areas feature white oak hardwood floors, original framed artwork in living room and bedroom, and sleek, custom furnishings upholstered in luxurious natural fabrics. Bedroom offers one luxurious king size bed with sumptuous bedding and pillow selection, and include adjustable bedside reading lamps. Gourmet kitchens are equipped with a half refrigerator, dishwasher, dual burner induction cooktop and microwave, which are concealed within sleek custom cabinetry. Oversize marble clad baths include a large, walk-in glass enclosed shower, plush towels, and luxurious Bulgari bath amenities. Large screen TVs are in the bedroom and living room. Suites also include a concealed safe and convenient charging ports.

RoomDescription.Name: One Bedroom Premium Suite
RoomDescription.Text: These brand new, fully furnished 744 square foot premium suites feature expansive windows, custom designed furnishings, and a soothing residential ambiance. Spacious living areas feature contemporary yet comfortable seating in luxurious custom fabrics and textures; original artwork and white oak hardwood floors. Gourmet kitchen includes a full complement of upscale kitchen appliances and accessories, including a half refrigerator, dishwasher and duel dual burner induction cooktop. Tranquil bedroom includes king-size bed with sumptuous bedding and pillow selection, and include original framed artwork, Mecho room-darkening window shades and floor-to-ceiling sheer daylight curtains, ensuring a peaceful environment. Luxury extends into the elegant marble bathrooms which feature large walk-in glass showers, plush towels, luxurious Bulgari bath products, and comfortable cozy bathrobes. State of the art electronics including large brand new flat screen televisions in the living room and bedroom. Suites also include a concealed safe and convenient charging ports.

RoomDescription.Name: Two Bedroom Suite
RoomDescription.Text: These brand new, fully furnished 1037 square foot two bedroom suites are awash in natural daylight and the ultimate residential oasis. Spacious living areas feature contemporary yet comfortable furnishings in luxurious custom fabrics; expansive windows; original artwork and white oak hardwood floors throughout. Gourmet kitchen includes a full complement of upscale kitchen appliances and accessories, including a half refrigerator, dishwasher and dual burner induction cooktop. Tranquil bedrooms include one king (in Master) and one queen size bed (in 2nd bedroom) with sumptuous bedding and pillow selection, original framed artwork, Mecho room-darkening window shades and floor-to-ceiling sheer daylight curtains, ensuring a peaceful sleep environment. Sleek office alcove provides additional workspace. Luxury extends into the elegant marble bathrooms which feature large walk-in glass showers, plush towels, luxurious Bulgari bath products, and cozy bathrobes. State of the art electronics including large brand new flat screen televisions in the living room and bedroom. Suites also include a concealed safe and convenient charging ports.

RoomDescription.Name: One Bedroom Suite
RoomDescription.Text: Contemporary designed, furnished one-bedroom apartments range in size from 735-750 square feet. Each beautifully appointed apartment features a fully equipped kitchen with sleek stainless steel Sub Zero Bosch appliances, Kohler fixtures, and quartz zodiac island countertops with a frosted glass back splash. Additional features include newly-renovated, spa-like bathrooms with glass shower enclosures and Bulgari amenities; built in closets; washer and dryer; and hardwood floors throughout. All suites feature complimentary high-speed wireless internet, Samsung flat screen televisions with premium digital cable in living room as well as bedroom. Spacious bedrooms feature luxury linens, firm or hypoallergenic pillow selection and exclusive REM mattresses. Contemporary leather furniture creates a comfortable living area ideal for entertaining and relaxing.

RoomDescription.Name: One Bedroom Suite with Den
RoomDescription.Text: Elegantly furnished one-bedroom apartments featuring a den range in size from 755-791 square feet. Each beautifully appointed apartment features a fully equipped kitchen with sleek stainless steel Sub Zero Bosch appliances, Kohler fixtures, and quartz zodiac island countertops with a frosted glass back splash. Additional features include newly-renovated, spa-like bathrooms with glass shower enclosures and Bulgari amenities; built in closets; washer and dryer; and hardwood floors throughout. All suites feature complimentary high-speed wireless internet, Samsung flat screen televisions with premium digital cable in living room as well as bedroom. Spacious bedrooms feature luxury linens, firm or hypoallergenic pillow selection, and exclusive REM mattresses. Contemporary leather furniture creates a comfortable living area ideal for entertaining and relaxing, as well as a separate den suitable for working from home.

RoomDescription.Name: Two Bedroom Suite
RoomDescription.Text: Elegantly furnished two-bedroom apartments range in size from 851-885 square feet. Each beautifully appointed apartment features a fully equipped kitchen with sleek stainless steel Sub Zero Bosch appliances, Kohler fixtures, and quartz zodiac island countertops with a frosted glass back splash. Additional features include newly-renovated, spa-like bathrooms with glass shower enclosures and Bulgari amenities; built in closets; washer and dryer; and hardwood floors throughout. All suites feature complimentary high-speed wireless internet, Samsung flat screen televisions with premium digital cable in living room as well as bedrooms. Spacious bedrooms feature luxury linens, firm or hypoallergenic pillow selection and exclusive REM mattresses. Contemporary leather furniture creates a comfortable living area ideal for entertaining and relaxing.

RoomDescription.Name: Penthouse Suite
RoomDescription.Text: Brand new custom-designed one bedroom Penthouse suites features a comfortable sitting room with rich hardwood flooring, cutting edge flat screen tv, and an essential, well-placed wet bar. Generously-sized spa baths are clad in Italian Carrara marble and include both a glass walled shower and separate soaking tub for ultimate relaxation. Bathrooms are furnished with an assortment of luxurious Bulgari amenities and most include windows. Enjoy tranquil bedrooms with king size beds dressed in AKA’s exclusive a.sleep bedding and an inviting chaise lounge. A very special feature of these magnificent suites are the unique architectural details including exposed cast iron structural element that celebrate the history of this landmarked building. Enjoy elevated accommodations with exclusive access to our chic a.lounge, located on the Penthouse Level.

RoomDescription.Name: Penthouse Hotel Suite
RoomDescription.Text: Brand new custom-designed one bedroom Penthouse suites features a comfortable sitting room with rich hardwood flooring, cutting edge flat screen tv, and an essential, well-placed wet bar. Generously-sized spa baths are clad in Italian Carrara marble and include a glass walled shower. Bathrooms are furnished with an assortment of luxurious Bulgari amenities and most include windows. Enjoy tranquil bedrooms with king size beds dressed in AKA’s exclusive a.sleep bedding and an inviting chaise lounge. A very special feature of these magnificent suites are the unique architectural details including exposed cast iron structural element that celebrate the history of this landmarked building. Enjoy elevated accommodations with exclusive access to our chic a.lounge, located on the Penthouse Level.

RoomDescription.Name: One Bedroom Suite
RoomDescription.Text: These generous one bedroom suites range from just under 615 to 680 square feet and are located on floors 3-9. These large apartments feature a graciously sized bedroom with one king-sized bed, and a luxurious marble clad bathroom with glass mosaic accents and Bulgari amenities. Fully equipped kitchen features stainless steel appliances and granite countertops, and a full complement of upscale kitchen accessories. The living room is furnished in a modern, yet comfortable style that includes a sofa, comfortable chair and a dining area. Plasma TV’s featuring a premium HBO cable package are located in both the bedroom and the living room making the space ideal for entertaining and relaxing. Should you have more than two persons staying in the suite there is a mandatory additional charge of $75 plus tax per night for a rollaway bed.

RoomDescription.Name: One Bedroom Premium Suite
RoomDescription.Text: These impressive apartments are located on 11th floor or higher and feature a bedroom with one king-sized bed, and a luxurious marble clad bathroom with glass mosaic accents and Bulgari amenities. Fully equipped kitchen features stainless steel appliances and granite countertops, and a full complement of upscale kitchen accessories. The living room is furnished in a modern, yet comfortable style that includes a sofa, comfortable chairs and a dining area. Plasma TV’s featuring a premium HBO cable package are located in both the bedroom and the living room making the space ideal for entertaining and relaxing.

RoomDescription.Name: One Bedroom Penthouse
RoomDescription.Text: Newly upgraded Penthouse suites are located on the 15th and 16th floors and feature custom-designed contemporary furnishings and upholstery. Rich hardwood floors in foyer, living, and dining area, which includes dining table with seating for six. Fully-equipped gourmet kitchen include granite countertops, stainless steel Fisher Paykel appliances, Nespresso machine, and full range of accessories. Spacious, tranquil bedroom features king size beds and pillows with luxurious Sferra Italian linens, a.sleep king mattress, designed exclusively for AKA, and furniture of exotic, dark massacar ebony wood and fine lacquers. Living room, dining room and bedroom lighting have been hand selected and imported from Italy and complement the sophisticated grey palette. Elegant accents such as original framed photography and Meco blackout window treatments enhance the Penthouse experience. Marble clad bathroom with glass mosaic accents and amenities by Bulgari. 55’ 4K HDTV in living room and 50 ‘ HDTV in bedroom, equipped with Apple TV. USB charging dock station, conveniently located in the bedroom. Premium cable offering 200 channels and DVR capabilities included; international channels available upon request. Suites offer individual heating and A/C control.

RoomDescription.Name: Studio Premium
RoomDescription.Text: These spacious, recently-renovated studios range from 350 to 400 square feet, located on 11th floor or higher. They offer wet bars that include a microwave, mini-refrigerator and sink with a granite counter top and a full complement of upscale kitchen accessories. Other features include a luxurious king-sized bed, marble clad bathroom with glass mosaic accents, Bulgari amenities, Plasma TV featuring premium HBO cable package. Premium Studios may also feature a seating area, and/or desk depending on the floorplan.

GuaranteeDescription.Text: A valid credit card is required to guarantee reservation. Full payment is required upon check-in.

PenaltyDescription.Text: Cancellation must be received 72 hours prior to arrival to avoid a penalty of 50% of stay plus tax.

RoomDescription.Name: 11 - Terrace Suite
RoomDescription.Text: - 2000+ sqft- Separate bedroom with king bed- Full kitchen and dining room- Bed throws by Society- Two bathrooms- Scandinavian inspired furniture and finishes- Custom art by Katie Yang- 55inch flat screen TVs- Views of Lafayette or Howard Streets- High-speed wireless internet- In-room safe- Blow dryer- Iron- Grown Alchemist bath amenities- KEYPR technology (Tablet to order anything from room service to fresh towels) - Create Your Own Minibar featuring Conscious Commerce products- Private, landscaped 12th floor terraceComplimentary Services:- Airport Transfer- Access to The Blond bar and loungeComplimentary Amenities & Gifts:- 11 Howard Scented Candle (original scent created by Parisian company Mad et Len & Oliver Gustav)- Signature Pink Bed Thow by Society- MinibarTwo interconnecting spaces on the corner of the hotel make up this suite that includes a dining area for eight, an adjoining kitchen, living room and guest bathroom. Through large French Doors, the living space opens onto a private outdoor, rooftop terrace with birds eye views of the neighborhood. A separate bedroom and connecting lounge have their own bathroom. The cozy working area overlooks the living room, ensuring that this suite has a dedicated space for anything you'd need to do during your stay, be it entertaining guests, enjoying the sun on your terrace or simply relaxing. The room, with beautiful 9 feet high ceilings, contains custom furniture exclusively designed for the hotel by Signe Bindslev Henriksen & Peter Bundgaard Rützou, oak-plank floors, and soft natural bamboo area rugs.

RoomDescription.Name: 06 - Howard Deluxe
RoomDescription.Text: - King bed- Bed throws by Society- Larger bathroom and closet- Scandinavian inspired furniture and finishes- Custom art by Katie Yang - 48inch flat screen TVs- Lounge area for dining or working- Views of Lafayette or Howard Streets- High-speed wireless internet- In-room safe- Blow dryer- Iron- Grown Alchemist bath amenities- KEYPR technology (Tablet to order anything from room service to fresh towels) - Create Your Own Minibar featuring Conscious Commerce products Looking for a getaway? Howard Deluxe rooms are a tipping point of sorts, where a stay can truly become a retreat. These bright and spacious rooms with 11 feet high ceilings look onto cozy Howard Street, with a lounge area for both dining and working. It's the perfect perch from which to plan your next Manhattan adventure or simply relax with a few friends after a day in the city. Add to that our signature custom furniture and you have enough of a reason to order take-out or room service and stay put for a night. The rooms, with beautiful high ceilings, contain custom furniture exclusively designed for the hotel by Signe Bindslev Henriksen & Peter Bundgaard Rützou, oak-plank floors, and soft natural bamboo area rugs.

RoomDescription.Name: 09 - Howard Suite
RoomDescription.Text: - Bed throws by Society- Danish-inspired furniture and finishes- Custom art by Katie Yang- 55-inch flat-screen TV - Complimentary high-speed wireless Internet- KEYPR technology with in-room tablet for ordering hotel services- Create-your-own minibar featuring products from Conscious Commerce and Thrive Market- Grown Alchemist bath amenities- Hair dryer- In-room safe- Iron and ironing board upon request Complimentary Services:- Airport Transfer- Access to The Blond bar and lounge Complimentary Amenities & Gifts:- 11 Howard Scented Candle (original scent created by Parisian company Mad et Len & Oliver Gustav)- Signature Pink Bed Thow by Society- MinibarWhile our goal at 11 Howard is to provide the essentials of hospitality, our suites deliver more—much more. Our Howard Suite consists of two interconnecting spaces on the corner of the hotel, making up 640 square feet of living area. These accommodations include a separate bedroom with king bed, master bathroom, living room, working area and guest bathroom. 11 Howard’s guest accommodations feature light oak floors, custom-crafted furniture, and 9 feet high ceilings, as well as natural bamboo area rugs, double-weave wool bed throws, and ceramic wall sculptures by Taiwanese artist Katie Yang. Bathrooms are stocked with organic bath products and finished in marble and brass.

GuaranteeDescription.Text: All reservations must be guaranteed with a non-refundable deposit of the full stay at the time of booking. Non-guaranteed reservations are not accepted.

PenaltyDescription.Text: Reservations must be cancelled or modified 7 days prior to arrival day to avoid a full stay fee excluding tax. No-Show fee: Full stay excluding tax.
